src:
明徳義塾がセンバツ当確　馬淵監督「県大会のビデオを１０回くらい見て」コールド勝ち

02 Nov 2019

　「秋季高校野球四国大会・準決勝、明徳義塾１６－１高知中央」（２日、オロナミンＣ球場）
　明徳義塾（高知３位）が五回コールドで高知中央（高知１位）を下して決勝に進出。来春センバツ出場に当確ランプをともした。初回に無死満塁から５番・新沢颯真内野手（２年）が走者一掃の左越え二塁打を放つなど一挙８点の猛攻。さらに二回にも、新沢が右越えに満塁本塁打を放つなど８点を奪った。
　打線は１２安打で１６得点。投げては先発のエース左腕・新地智也投手（２年）が５回を５安打１失点の好投を見せた。
　県大会準決勝で１０－１１で敗れた高知中央に大差でリベンジを果たし、馬淵史郎監督（６３）は「県大会のビデオを１０回くらい見て相手を研究した。選手たちがつなぐ意識を徹底して、低い打球を打っていったのが勝因」と笑顔。高校初アーチを放ち、２安打７打点と大活躍した新沢は「ホームランも７打点も初めてなので、すごくうれしい。自分にとって特別な試合になった」と話した。
　明徳義塾は２年ぶりの優勝を目指し、３日の決勝で尽誠学園（香川１位）と対戦する。
text:
Meitoku Gijuku is Senbatsu Toshin, Director Mabuchi “Watching the Prefectural Tournament Videos About 10 Times” Cold Win

02 Nov 2019

“Autumn High School Baseball Shikoku Tournament, Semi-Final, Meitoku Gijuku 16-1 Kochi Chuo” (2nd, Oronamin C Stadium)
Meitoku Gijuku (Kochi 3rd) defeated Kochi Chuo (Kochi 1st) in the fifth cold and advanced to the final. A certain lamp was put on next year's Senbatsu. The first time, 8th onslaught, such as No. 5 from the deathless man, Makoto Niizawa infielder (2 years) shot the runners away and left over twice. Two more times, Niizawa scored 8 points, including hitting a full home run over the right.
The batting line is 12 hits and 16 points. Throwing the pitcher, Ace's left arm, Tomoya Shinchi (2 years), showed a good throw of 5 hits and 1 run.
Shiro Mabuchi (63) studied the opponent after watching the prefectural convention video about 10 times. “I was hit by a low hit ball,” he says. Niizawa, who released a high school first arch and made a big success with 2 hits and 7 RBIs, said, “I'm very happy because both the home run and 7 RBIs are new. It was a special game for me.”
Meitoku Gijuku aims to win for the first time in two years, and will play against Seimei Gakuen (1st place in Kagawa) in the final on the 3rd.
